Putting all together:

Now, the full Fortran code:

program combined

    implicit none

    integer :: N, i, j, dx, dy, oddCount
    real :: sum_dist, average, dist
    integer, dimension(:,:), allocatable :: pos
    character(len=100) :: str
    integer :: counts(0:255) = 0
    character(len=1) :: c

    ! Read input for first part
    read(*,*) N
    allocate(pos(2,N))
    do i = 1, N
        read(*,*) pos(1,i), pos(2,i)
    end do

    ! Compute average distance
    sum_dist = 0.0
    do i = 1, N
        do j = 1, N
            if (i == j) cycle
            dx = pos(1,i) - pos(1,j)
            dy = pos(2,i) - pos(2,j)
            dist = sqrt(real(dx*dx + dy*dy))
            sum_dist = sum_dist + dist
        end do
    end do
    average = sum_dist / real(N)

    ! Convert average to string
    write(str, '(F20.10)') average

    ! Process the string for the second part
    do i = 1, len_trim(str)
        c = str(i:i)
        counts(ichar(c)) = counts(ichar(c)) + 1
    end do

    ! Count odd counts
    oddCount = 0
    do i = 0, 255
        if (counts(i) > 0) then
            if (mod(counts(i),2) == 1) then
                oddCount = oddCount + 1
            end if
        end if
    end do

    ! Determine output
    if ( (oddCount <=1) .or. mod(oddCount,2) ==1 ) then
        print *, "First"
    else
        print *, "Second"
    end if

end program combined

program combined

    implicit none

    integer :: N, i, j, dx, dy, oddCount
    real :: sum_dist, average, dist
    integer, dimension(:,:), allocatable :: pos
    character(len=100) :: temp_str, str
    integer :: counts(0:255) = 0
    character(len=1) :: c

    ! Read input for first part
    read(*,*) N
    allocate(pos(2,N))
    do i = 1, N
        read(*,*) pos(1,i), pos(2,i)
    end do

    ! Compute average distance
    sum_dist = 0.0
    do i = 1, N
        do j = 1, N
            if (i == j) cycle
            dx = pos(1,i) - pos(1,j)
            dy = pos(2,i) - pos(2,j)
            dist = sqrt( real(dx*dx + dy*dy) )
            sum_dist = sum_dist + dist
        end do
    end do
    average = sum_dist / real(N)

    ! Convert average to string
    write(temp_str, '(F20.10)') average
    str = adjustl(temp_str)

    ! Process the string for the second part
    do i = 1, len_trim(str)
        c = str(i:i)
        counts(ichar(c)) = counts(ichar(c)) + 1
    end do

    ! Count odd counts
    oddCount = 0
    do i = 0, 255
        if (counts(i) > 0) then
            if (mod(counts(i),2) == 1) then
                oddCount = oddCount + 1
            end if
        end if
    end do

    ! Determine output
    if ( (oddCount <=1) .or. mod(oddCount,2) ==1 ) then
        print *, "First"
    else
        print *, "Second"
    end if

end program combined
